ship.commandDescription: Ship yourself or someone with somebody else.

high.0: The image says {{percent}}%, but I say 200%
high.5: "I accept that" - a random Switchblade developer.

medium.0: {{firstName}} could try but I don't think {{secondName}} would want that.
medium.1: {{percent}}%... well... there are more people in the world you know...
medium.2: {{firstName}} and {{secondName}} could be friends, but maybe...
medium.6: Seems like {{firstName}} and {{secondName}} are just strangers to each other.

low.1: {{shipName}}? I don't think {{firstName}} will like it.
low.2: Nothing is impossible... but this is.
low.3: owo what's this? {{shipName}}?? owo I'm out!
low.4: {{secondName}} may not accept it, but I'm always here supporting you :)
low.6: i think neither {{firstName}} and {{secondName}} liked it
